title: Atlassian security advisory (AV25-770)
description: On November 18, 2025, Atlassian published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Bitbucket Data Center and Server  multiple versions
Confluence Data Center and Server  multiple versions
Jira Data Center and Server  multiple versions
Jira Service Management Data Center and Server  multiple versions
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
